name: cytogenetics
content:

the scientific study of chromosomes (= structures found in all living cells, containing the chemical patterns that control what an animal or plant is like) and their effect on the behaviour of cells in the body, often used in medical tests for particular genetic conditions: Cytogenetics is routinely used for prenatal diagnosis of chromosomal abnormalities. There have been exciting advances in cytogenetics and molecular genetics. Related words

cytogeneticist
